title: Modulating the effective ionic radii of trivalent dopants in ceria using a combination of dopants to improve catalytic efficiency for the oxygen evolution reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17801-17813
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03360D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Debarati Das, Jyoti Prakash, Anisha Bandyopadhyay, Annu Balhara, U. K. Goutam, Raghunath Acharya, Santosh K. Gupta, Kathi Sudarshan
Matching effective ionic radii of trivalent dopants with the host through judicious choice of dopants and codopants has emerged as a smarter strategy for improving OER catalytic activity of ceria than individual ion doping.
